Use a virtual assistant app like Siri or Alexa to set reminders for important tasks and deadlines, so you don't miss any opportunities to work on your assignment.
Create a visual representation of your assignment, such as a mind map or flowchart, to help you organize your thoughts and ideas.
Break the assignment into smaller, more manageable tasks and set a goal to complete one task per day.
Use a time-tracking app to monitor how much time you spend on each task, so you can adjust your workflow as needed to stay on track.
Find a study group or accountability partner who can provide support and motivation as you work on your assignment.
